version_description:
1.0.1 更新：

1. 新增避免遊玩時暫停按鈕誤觸的功能
2. 新增詳細的校正頁面
3. 改善遊戲核心的操作性
4. Bug fix

3. 改善遊戲核心的操作性

4. Add Korean localization

Version 2.1.0:
1) Launch of Lanota account functions and a new game progress cloud save system. Detailed descriptions of functions can be viewed on the brand-new [Player Info] page.
2) A newly added Rating system records scores based on player pe
